content.value: public class XunitTestMethodRunnerBaseContext<TTestMethod, TTestCase> : TestMethodRunnerContext<TTestMethod, TTestCase>, IAsyncLifetime, IAsyncDisposable where TTestMethod : class, IXunitTestMethod where TTestCase : class, IXunitTestCase

Public Class XunitTestMethodRunnerBaseContext(Of TTestMethod As {Class, IXunitTestMethod}, TTestCase As {Class, IXunitTestCase}) Inherits TestMethodRunnerContext(Of TTestMethod, TTestCase) Implements IAsyncLifetime, IAsyncDisposable

inheritedMembers.summary: Gets the aggregator used for reporting exceptions.
Gets the cancellation token source used for cancelling test execution.
Gets a flag which indicates how explicit tests should be handled.
Gets the message bus to send execution engine messages to.
Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources asynchronously.
Called immediately after the class has been created, before it is used.
